item.title: Enabling Source Maps in Chrome
item.description: Update: Google have now compiled a solid walkthrough that can be see here: Debugging JavaScript - Source Maps I’ve seen a couple of posts about enabling source map support, but never actually got it up and running. Below are the steps that I took to achieve this. I use Google Chrome in my development workflow and almost all of the time it’s the Canary variation. The (latest) version I’m currently using is “Version 26.
